name: ytptube
description: ytptube is a self-hosted interface and automation tool for downloading and organizing YouTube content, exposing a simple web UI and configuration for recurring downloads.
features: Channel monitoring: Subscribe to YouTube channels and automatically download new videos as they're published.
Web dashboard: Manage subscriptions, view download history, and configure settings through a clean web interface.
Download scheduling: Set specific times for downloads to run to avoid peak network usage hours.
Quality profiles: Define preferred video quality and format settings per channel or globally.
Storage organization: Automatically organize downloaded videos into folders by channel, date, or custom patterns.
Metadata preservation: Save video descriptions, upload dates, and channel information alongside downloaded files.
Duplicate prevention: Skip videos that have already been downloaded to avoid wasting bandwidth and storage.
Playlist support: Monitor and download entire playlists with automatic updates when new videos are added.
Selective downloads: Filter which videos to download based on title keywords, duration, or upload date.
Bandwidth limiting: Throttle download speeds to prevent saturating network connections during active use.
Notification system: Receive alerts when new videos are downloaded or when errors occur during processing.
API integration: Control downloads and manage subscriptions programmatically using REST API endpoints.
